name: Eva- framed tweed evening bag...
description:
Eva is always being wined and dined- expensive dinners, trips to the opera, and elegant soirees. But secretly, she loves rock concerts, trips to the shops, and a large glass of red down the pub. 
All in a all, she's a party animal, and needs a new owner to satisfy her partying needs!

Made from a gorgeous purple, green, and teal tweed, upcycled from a scottish tweed kilt, this bag is finished with a gorgeous quality silver toned chunky snap frame. It is lined with a navy floral needle cord, and embellished with ribbon, embroidery and a vintage fabric corsage. The corsage is also removable, so you can tone your outfit in with your bag! She has a ribbon handle, to make her easy and stylish to carry. 

Eva would look equally fab with your gown or your jeans- how can you possibly resist? 

Frame measures 13cm (5") wide, by 7cm (3") deep. The bag is 27cm (10.5") long, and 26cm (10") wide at its widest point.

name: Anna- the Flouncy Handbag...
description:
Anna is Flossie's edgy sister. Still a flouncy, flirty girly delight, but this time, she has a bit more bite!. She is perfect for a day at the races, a night on the tiles, or just for giving your outfit a little bit more sass! 

She has been repurposed from 100% pure wool kilt, and houndstooth tweed, sexy and eco-friendly all at once! She has gorgeous red floral handles, a lining to match and is decorated with a beautiful vintage fabric corsage( which is removable, so you can wear it as a brooch too!), with a vintage button centre. 

What a corker!

Measurements:
Length: 29cm/ 11"
Width at bottom: 48cm/ 18"
Width at top: 21cm/ 8.5"
Handles: 56cm/ 22"

name: Billie- The mini day bag...
Kathryn- purple heathered tweed Market Bag...
Esme- The Carousel Horse Bag...
description: The ‘Esme’ bag is a fan of the fairground. She thinks there is nothing more magical than the smell of candyfloss, the bright lights, and above all, a ride on the majestic carnival carousel. Made from cobalt blue and black houndstooth fabric in a wool blend, with a red floral cotton lining, internal pocket, and matching corsage. She measures 32cm x 42cm (12.5” x 16.5”). She has a green herringbone tweed pocket, decorated with a carousel horse patch, stitched around with metallic gold thread, and co-ordinating button decoration. Her corsage is made from various tweeds and cottons with a vintage button centre piece. She is perfect for carrying your worldly belongings on a day-to day basis- perhaps your school things, or your work papers, your gym kit or just your purse, phone and diary! She doesn’t like to be too overloaded though!. Inspired by Scotland, and carnivals, she is basically just a very cute little tote bag. She also has a matching purse/ pouch/ make-up bag (sold seperately, so take a look if you fancy! Gentle handwash only. First two photos courtesy of EMD photography.
